title: Derailleur Disaster Leaves Lorena Wiebes In Tears After Tour de France Femmes Opener
content:
Sprint rival rides into back wheel of prolific Dutchwoman in The Hague finale, wrecking chances of delight on home soil.

Read the full article at Derailleur Disaster Leaves Lorena Wiebes In Tears After Tour de France Femmes Opener on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
